item.title: Cluster Alert Overview
item.description: New to Searchlight? Please start here. ClusterAlerts What is ClusterAlert A ClusterAlert is a Kubernetes Custom Resource Definition (CRD). It provides declarative configuration of Icinga services for cluster level alerts in a Kubernetes native way. You only need to describe the desired check command and notifier in a ClusterAlert object, and the Searchlight operator will create Icinga2 hosts, services and notifications to the desired state for you.
